references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing a deep learning approach based on nonequilibrium thermodynamics that underpins much of the current research on generative modeling.
This work significantly advanced the field of diffusion models, establishing a more robust and efficient approach to generative modeling that is directly relevant to the work in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This highly influential paper introduced a practical and effective method for generating high-resolution images using diffusion models, providing a direct foundation for the methods used in the current study.

references.paper_title: UnlearnCanvas: Stylized image dataset for enhanced machine unlearning evaluation in diffusion models
references.reason: This recent work provides a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating machine unlearning techniques in diffusion models, offering a standardized way to compare the effectiveness of different methods, which is essential for this paper's evaluation.

references.paper_title: Localizing and editing knowledge in text-to-image generative models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the current work due to its focus on the mechanistic interpretability of text-to-image diffusion models, directly informing the methodology and analysis of the present study.
